name: New Releases Movies
short_description: This is a new releases movies information site where all the ultimate information of the new upcoming movies of bollywood may be found very easily . if any one interested to get the news of the new release movies like who is producer ,director,and casting actor and actress in the moveis can get the information. all the scoope and fact of the new release movies can search here very simply. This is an ultimate site for the news of the hindi movies having the information from the starting of the shooting to the releasing date of the film. It is very updated section giving the news of hindi bollywood movies
